name: Sub Survivia
description:
The Higabor Trench is a research treasure trove. Discoveries from its depths have fueled scientific research around the world. These discoveries come with a dangerous price. Exploration is hazardous and the margin for error is very slim. Four days ago, the Minderoo-VI mission suffered a catastrophic breach and had to abandon. Three of their pods failed to surface. We have received signals from the pods, confirming their occupants to be alive.

You've been dispatched to rescue and retrieve them. Thanks to the amount research and exploration over the years in Higabor, you'll find caches of supplies to refuel, repair, and re-oxygenate your vessel.

Good luck and come home safely.
